featured.text: __(18)__ a small child, he would pick up a broom and pretend to be playing guitar for the entertainment of family guests.
The hair and fur are made into mats and brooms and sent to 24 waters to absorb the oil.

definition.zh_def: 掃帚，一種用於清掃地面的工具，通常由長柄和鬚狀的刷毛組成。
definition.en_def: A broom is a tool used for sweeping floors, typically consisting of a long handle and bristles.
definition.example: She used a broom to clean the kitchen floor.
